title: Basic Korean
subtitle: Foundations of the Korean language for beginners.

topics.title: Korean Alphabet (Hangul)
topics.description: Learn how to read and write the Korean alphabet.

topics.title: Simple Greetings
topics.description: Basic phrases for greetings and introductions.

topics.title: Basic Pronouns
topics.description: Understanding Korean pronouns and their usage.

topics.title: Basic Sentence Structure
topics.description: How to build simple Korean sentences.

topics.title: Numbers in Korean
topics.description: Learn how to count in Korean using both native and Sino-Korean numbers.

title: Intermediate Korean
subtitle: Start building your vocabulary and understanding of grammar.

topics.title: Everyday Phrases
topics.description: Common phrases used in everyday conversations.

topics.title: Verb Conjugation (Present Tense)
topics.description: Learn how to conjugate verbs in the present tense.

topics.title: Question Forms
topics.description: How to form and ask questions in Korean.

topics.title: Postpositions (Particles)
topics.description: Understanding the use of postpositions in sentences.

topics.title: Korean Honorifics
topics.description: Learn about the different levels of politeness in Korean.

title: Advanced Korean
subtitle: Master complex grammar, vocabulary, and natural conversation.

topics.title: Complex Sentence Structure
topics.description: How to form more complex sentences with multiple clauses.

topics.title: Past and Future Tense Conjugation
topics.description: Learn how to conjugate verbs in past and future tenses.

topics.title: Honorifics in Formal Speech
topics.description: Using advanced honorifics in formal and respectful contexts.

topics.title: Conditional Sentences
topics.description: Forming 'if-then' statements and understanding their usage.

topics.title: Idiomatic Expressions
topics.description: Learn common Korean idioms and expressions used in daily life.

title: Korean Culture and Context
subtitle: Learn about the cultural context and nuances in the Korean language.

topics.title: Politeness in Korean
topics.description: How politeness affects language use and social interactions.

topics.title: Korean Dialects
topics.description: Understanding regional differences and dialects in Korean.

topics.title: Korean Slang and Casual Language
topics.description: Learn how to use casual Korean in informal settings.

topics.title: Cultural Etiquette and Speech
topics.description: How language reflects Korean cultural etiquette and behavior.

topics.title: Korean Proverbs
topics.description: Understanding traditional Korean proverbs and their meanings.

title: Practical Korean for Daily Life
subtitle: Learn the Korean you need for everyday situations.

topics.title: Shopping in Korean
topics.description: Phrases and vocabulary to use when shopping in Korea.

topics.title: Ordering Food in Korean
topics.description: How to order food and drinks in Korean restaurants.

topics.title: Asking for Directions
topics.description: Learn how to ask and understand directions in Korean.

topics.title: Making Phone Calls
topics.description: Key phrases and etiquette for making phone calls in Korean.

topics.title: Korean for Travel
topics.description: Useful phrases and vocabulary for traveling around Korea.
